events.message: Applicant has completed and submitted the mortgage loan application for the new property purchase.
The loan application has been categorised under Mortgage Loan based on keywords related to home and property.
Loan officer assigned to the case is now responsible for processing the mortgage application with priority.
Initial review of the mortgage application has been conducted to ensure all fields are correctly completed.
Additional documents such as property deed and proof of income have been requested to proceed with underwriting.
Applicant submitted all requested documents, including appraisal report and updated bank statements.
Credit check performed successfully revealing satisfactory credit score for mortgage qualification.
Risk assessment completed, highlighting low risk due to strong income and stable employment history.
Mortgage loan offer has been presented to the applicant with favorable interest rates and payment terms.
Applicant has provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions regarding payment schedule.
Application escalated to senior underwriter for final approval due to loan size exceeding standard limits.
Mortgage loan has been approved by the senior underwriter based on review of all documentation and risk profile.
Approved mortgage funds have been disbursed to the escrow account to complete the property purchase process.
Following up with applicant to ensure understanding of payment schedule and answer any outstanding questions.
Mortgage application file has been closed after successful funding and post-approval follow-up completed.
